data.text: @EricPhDing Notice the time he’s tweeting that the CDC director “sucks”? 3:28 AM, 3/2/22. Switzerland time. It’s rough being on call 24/7 to gripe against the CDC while at the Feigl-Ding chalet.
@EricPhDing More aware of what?  What is this “COVID” you speak of?
@EricPhDing Mr Dung is sad that his 15 of fame are expired.  Watch his pivot to Sr National Security expert!!
@EricPhDing Covid is old news, nukes are the new episode
